-- Generated global constants

g_con_table_name  CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(61) := 'LM_PACKAGE_INSTRUCTIONS';
g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION pin_select_row( i_pin_ID   IN  lm_package_instructions.ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_pin   OUT lm_package_instructions%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION pin_select_row_upd( i_pin_ID   IN  lm_package_instructions.ID%TYPE
                           , o_rt_pin   OUT lm_package_instructions%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE pin_lock_row( i_pin_ID   IN  lm_package_instructions.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE pin_lock_row_nowait( i_pin_ID   IN  lm_package_instructions.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE pin_insert_row ( io_rt_pin  IN OUT lm_package_instructions%ROWTYPE )
;

FUNCTION pin_update_row( i_pin_ID   IN     lm_package_instructions.ID%TYPE
                       , io_rt_pin  IN OUT lm_package_instructions%ROWTYPE )
RETURN NUMBER
;

FUNCTION pin_delete_row( i_pin_ID   IN  lm_package_instructions.ID%TYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION pin_seq1_nextval
RETURN lm_package_instructions.ID%TYPE
;


END lm_pin_tapi_pck;

package body lm_pin_tapi_pck
is




function pin_select_row( i_pin_id   in  lm_package_instructions.id%type
                       , o_rt_pin   out lm_package_instructions%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pin_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pin ( i_pin_id   in  lm_package_instructions.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_package_instructions pin
            where pin.id = i_pin_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_pin( i_pin_id => i_pin_id );
         fetch c_pin into o_rt_pin;
         l_found := c_pin%found;
         close c_pin;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_pin%isopen
         then
            close c_pin;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pin_select_row;

function pin_select_row_upd( i_pin_id   in  lm_package_instructions.id%type
                           , o_rt_pin   out lm_package_instructions%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pin_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_pin ( i_pin_id   in  lm_package_instructions.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_package_instructions pin
            where pin.id = i_pin_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_pin( i_pin_id => i_pin_id );
   fetch c_pin into o_rt_pin;
   l_found := c_pin%found;
   close c_pin;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_pin%isopen
      then
         close c_pin;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end pin_select_row_upd;

procedure pin_lock_row( i_pin_id   in  lm_package_instructions.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pin_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_pin ( i_pin_id   in  lm_package_instructions.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_package_instructions pin
              where pin.id = i_pin_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_pin_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                pin_lock_row_nowait( i_pin_id => i_pin_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_pin( i_pin_id => i_pin_id );
                  close c_pin;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_pin%isopen
         then
            close c_pin;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pin_lock_row;

procedure pin_lock_row_nowait( i_pin_id   in  lm_package_instructions.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pin_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pin ( i_pin_id   in  lm_package_instructions.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_package_instructions pin
               where pin.id = i_pin_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_pin_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_pin( i_pin_id => i_pin_id );

            close c_pin;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_pin%isopen
        then
           close c_pin;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_pin_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end pin_lock_row_nowait;

                           , io_rt_pin  in out lm_package_instructions%rowtype )
return number

function pin_perform_delete( i_pin_id   in  lm_package_instructions.id%type )
return boolean

procedure pin_insert_row ( io_rt_pin  in out lm_package_instructions%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pin_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into lm_package_instructions( id
                                , pid
                                , date_created
                                , ims_id
                                , pty_id
                                , haa_id
                                , pss_id )
              values ( io_rt_pin.id
                     , io_rt_pin.pid
                     , io_rt_pin.date_created
                     , io_rt_pin.ims_id
                     , io_rt_pin.pty_id
                     , io_rt_pin.haa_id
                     , io_rt_pin.pss_id )
           returning id
                   , pid
                   , date_created
                   , ims_id
                   , pty_id
                   , haa_id
                   , pss_id
                into io_rt_pin.id
                   , io_rt_pin.pid
                   , io_rt_pin.date_created
                   , io_rt_pin.ims_id
                   , io_rt_pin.pty_id
                   , io_rt_pin.haa_id
                   , io_rt_pin.pss_id;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_pin.id||'"'
                                                             ||', PID = "'||io_rt_pin.pid||'"'
                                                             ||', DATE_CREATED = "'||io_rt_pin.date_created||'"'
                                                             ||', IMS_ID = "'||io_rt_pin.ims_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PTY_ID = "'||io_rt_pin.pty_id||'"'
                                                             ||', HAA_ID = "'||io_rt_pin.haa_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PSS_ID = "'||io_rt_pin.pss_id||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pin_insert_row;

function pin_perform_update( i_pin_id   in     lm_package_instructions.id%type
                           , io_rt_pin  in out lm_package_instructions%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pin_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update lm_package_instructions
            set id = io_rt_pin.id
              , pid = io_rt_pin.pid
              , date_created = io_rt_pin.date_created
              , ims_id = io_rt_pin.ims_id
              , pty_id = io_rt_pin.pty_id
              , haa_id = io_rt_pin.haa_id
              , pss_id = io_rt_pin.pss_id
          where id = i_pin_id
      returning id
              , pid
              , date_created
              , ims_id
              , pty_id
              , haa_id
              , pss_id
           into io_rt_pin.id
              , io_rt_pin.pid
              , io_rt_pin.date_created
              , io_rt_pin.ims_id
              , io_rt_pin.pty_id
              , io_rt_pin.haa_id
              , io_rt_pin.pss_id;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_pin.id||'"'
                                                             ||', PID = "'||io_rt_pin.pid||'"'
                                                             ||', DATE_CREATED = "'||io_rt_pin.date_created||'"'
                                                             ||', IMS_ID = "'||io_rt_pin.ims_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PTY_ID = "'||io_rt_pin.pty_id||'"'
                                                             ||', HAA_ID = "'||io_rt_pin.haa_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PSS_ID = "'||io_rt_pin.pss_id||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pin_perform_update;

function pin_perform_delete( i_pin_id   in  lm_package_instructions.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pin_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from lm_package_instructions
          where id = i_pin_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_pin_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end pin_perform_delete;

function pin_update_row( i_pin_id   in     lm_package_instructions.id%type
                       , io_rt_pin  in out lm_package_instructions%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pin_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         pin_lock_row( i_pin_id   =>  i_pin_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            pin_perform_update( i_pin_id   =>  i_pin_id
                              , io_rt_pin  => io_rt_pin );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_pin.id||'"'
                                                          ||', PID = "'||io_rt_pin.pid||'"'
                                                          ||', DATE_CREATED = "'||io_rt_pin.date_created||'"'
                                                          ||', IMS_ID = "'||io_rt_pin.ims_id||'"'
                                                          ||', PTY_ID = "'||io_rt_pin.pty_id||'"'
                                                          ||', HAA_ID = "'||io_rt_pin.haa_id||'"'
                                                          ||', PSS_ID = "'||io_rt_pin.pss_id||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end pin_update_row;

function pin_delete_row( i_pin_id   in  lm_package_instructions.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pin_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         pin_lock_row( i_pin_id   =>  i_pin_id );

         
         l_deleted := pin_perform_delete( i_pin_id   =>  i_pin_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_pin_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end pin_delete_row;

function pin_seq1_nextval
return lm_package_instructions.id%type
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pin_seq1_nextval';
   l_pin_id  lm_package_instructions.id%type;
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         select lm_pin_seq1.nextval 
           into l_pin_id
           from dual;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_pin_id;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pin_seq1_nextval;


end lm_pin_tapi_pck;
